showScoreExcerpt:
"Hugh Jackman and Sutton Foster in the iconic roles of Professor Harold Hill and Marian Paroo shine bright and hit all the right notes (most of the time). But they, like the story itself, are two-dimensional and paper-thin...Instead, the stars (and I mean Stars!) of this 'Music Man' are the ensemble, particularly the young actors (from five to 25) who utterly steal the show with smiles and charm, but most especially with their extraordinary dancing."
